info.title: Cloverly
info.description: Cloverly's powerful API calculates the impact of common carbon-intensive activities in real time and uses verified, quality carbon offset projects to neutralize them. Businesses and consumers count on Cloverly to offset their carbon footprint and create positive environmental change based on real-time business activities.

post.description: Allows either the calculation or purchase of an offset to neutralize the impact.
Allows either the calculation or purchase of an offset to neutralize the impact.
Calculate the carbon emissions from package shipping and offset the impact.

post.summary: Calculate emissions from merchant category code (MCC)
post.description: Calculate the carbon emissions from merchant category code (MCC) and offset the impact.
Calculate the carbon emissions from freight shipments and offset the impact.
post.summary: Calculate the emissions from freight shipments

post.description: Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from a flight.
Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from a vehicle.
Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from electricity.

get.description: Get details about an offset source with the given project ID.

Returns a list of project types.

post.description: Converts a carbon offset estimate to a purchase
